### Result

We did three independent experiments, and the results of each independent experiment on its corresponding test set are as follows.

|  |  PER | WER  |
|---| ---|--- |
| exp1 | 4.04 | 4.44  |
| exp2 | 5.18 | 5.64 |
| exp3 | 3.45 | 3.99 |
| avg-3 | 4.22 | 4.69 |
